text: Hey. According to Ubersuggest i there is over 100 url from spammy .xyz domains linking to a HS Website of a client. They donÂ´t have any DR or appear of any value, but i am afraid that those spammy links might hurt the SEO of the client. Is that correct? Is there anything i can do about that?

If you are 100% certain they are indeed spammy links and not ones your client wants to be associated with, you could do the disavow links through Google Search Console: <https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/2648487?hl=en>
Thanks AJ, totally forgot that this feature exists!
